title: Dark Ambient Soundtracks
description: 10 tracks in dark ambient style aimed at creating a depressing atmosphere of horror, as well as the 49 sounds that make up the tracks that you can use the way you would like!
longDescription:
10 tracks in dark ambient style aimed at creating a depressing atmosphere of horror and an atmosphere of hopelessness and fear, perfectly filling your game with gloomy tones.

Along with the 10 tracks there are 49 attached sounds that make them up. And in the end you get ready-made soundtracks plus their full content and you can rearrange sounds to your needs. Do as you like! Ready-made constructor with bright examples and full component. You can compose your tracks, or use the ready-made tracks, or just pull out the sounds you need.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 59

Number of Audio Cues: 59

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 33:45 (Not counting the sound FX, just tracks)

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: No

Important/Additional Notes:


Link To prewiev: https://soundcloud.com/v-g-vitaly-gintsar/sets/dark-ambient-soundtracks
